original_text: What I will show to you must happen at the time that I have decided. That is a future time, but it will certainly happen, as I have said. It may not happen very soon, but you must be patient. What I show to you will certainly happen at the right time, so wait for it.
korean_text: 이 묵시는 정한 때가 있나니 그 종말이 속히 이르겠고 결코 거짓되지 아니하리라 비록 더딜지라도 기다리라 지체되지 않고 반드시 응하리라

sentences.original_text: What I will show to you must happen
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 보여줄 것은 반드시 일어날 것이다

sentences.original_text: at the time that I have decided
It may not happen very soon
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 매우 빨리 일어나지 않을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: What I show to you will certainly happen
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 보여주는 것은 반드시 일어날 것이다
